Posts.EditableText: I'd like to download my gamebook on a USB bracelet and wear it regularly because I'm a sentimental schmuck. I've read a forum thread regarding the transfer of games to USBs, and if we download the Quest game editor and put it on the USB along with the game, we can play the game on any computer without ever having to download Quest? Am I getting this right? I just want to make sure it'll work before I commit to this and actually order the USB bracelet.
Posts.HTML: I'd like to download my gamebook on a USB bracelet and wear it regularly because I'm a sentimental schmuck. I've read a forum thread regarding the transfer of games to USBs, and if we download the Quest game editor and put it on the USB along with the game, we can play the game on any computer without ever having to download Quest? Am I getting this right? I just want to make sure it'll work before I commit to this and actually order the USB bracelet.
